text: Angry Birds Space is a science fiction puzzle video game developed by Rovio Entertainment. The game was released on March 22, 2012. It is the fourth mainline game in the Angry Birds series, and is the first to take place in outer space. ==Gameplay== Similar to Angry Birds, players use a slingshot to control birds without wings. The target is to destroy all the pigs. However, the gravitational field is completely different from Angry Birds. When in space, there is zero gravity. Atmospheres are in most levels, which contain gravity that goes towards the centre of the atmosphere. ===Levels=== Level Pack Levels Release date Pig Bang 1-1 to 1-30 March 2012 Cold Cuts 2-1 to 2-30 March 2012 Fry Me to the Moon 3-1 to 3-10 April 2012 Utopia 4-1 to 4-30 May 2012 Red Planet 5-1 to 5-30 August 2012 Pig Dipper 6-1 to 6-30 January 2013 Eggsteroids E-1 to E-14 March 2012 Danger Zone D-1 to D-30 March 2012 ==Reception== ===Sales=== Angry Birds Space was downloaded over 10 million times just 3 days after it released. ==References== Category:2012 video games Category:Android (operating system) games Category:Freeware games Category:IOS games Category:Puzzle video games
title: Angry Birds Space
